Text:
Awesome episode with appearance Andy & John...
Amazing Dj's.
I can't remember when i listen such a cool episode.
Thank You Captim,separated version most importent for me in this case.
Greetings.

I just wanna take a little time and say how grateful that I am for having these downloads available each week... I am at school every Thursday so I miss every ASOT :(  These torrents are amazing! the fact that you have each track seperate rather than 1 whole track of the show is awsome. TY Captim!!

Yeah, very funny episode! I realized really late whats going on there. Normally other DJ are just speaking when introducin their song. But even a guy like Armin needs vacation! But Andy Moore and John O'Callaghan did a great job. BTW thanks for your appreciation!
Thank you Captim, keep up the good work!

hey thank you very much AWESOME download!!
i was just wondering can you please tell em how you got the tracks split? instead of mix i like it soo much more and would like to do it myself with some tiesto podcasts aswell so i would love for you to tell em how thanks again! :)
